summary: Attendance tracking app with total working time calculation, calendar event integration, work brief notes, and admin-approved user management (username/password).

existing_features.title: Implement username/password user management with admin approval required before a user can use the app, including admin CRUD (view/edit/delete) for users.

Fix and ensure total working time is correctly calculated and updated when attendance check-in/check-out times are set/edited for past dates, and ensure attendance summaries correctly sum totalWorkingTime over the selected range.
Add a 'work brief note' text field to each attendance entry, persisted in the backend and editable in the attendance day editor UI.
Make the existing Calendar feature functional by wiring calendar event queries/mutations to the backend and integrate attendance with calendar events so attendance entries appear as calendar events.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update total working time by calculating/recalculating hours from attendance check-in/check-out times, including past date/time edits.
Make the existing calendar feature work with attendance (attendance entries appear as calendar events).
Add a 'work brief note' text field to each attendance entry.
Add user management: username/password login, admin approval required before access, and admin CRUD (view/edit/delete) for users.

projectName: User management with admin approval, attendance hours recalculation, work brief notes, and calendar integration
